page.title: 02FACILITIES OF CORBRIDGE AREA
page.content: The inhabitants of the Corbridge area are well served by its shopping facilities and amenities.Both food and non-food shops provide a varied choice,for example a fresh fish shop and a D.I.Y. There are many businesses,such as crafts,book shops and antique shops,that are particularly popular with the many tourists.Banks and the Post Office provide an important service to residents,business owners and the farming community.The part-time library provides a comprehensive service for borrowers.The chemist, dentists and Health Centre are especially important to those people unable to travel any distance for medical help.Several pubs,hotels, restaurants and a take-away food shop serve both residents and visitors.
